item.title: Validating MODIS Sea Surface Temperature with Global Drifter Program Observations
item.description: Introduction Needed Packages Several packages are needed for this routine (this assumes are installed already in the machine). The package include tidyverse1, which is a collection of R packages designed for reading and importing data; manipulating and transforming imported data and visualize the results. The routine used several packages in the tidyverse including; ggplot22 used for visualizing, mapping and exploring the data
